title: @riot your client is fucked this patch
body:
seriously, its so goddamn buggy.
your shitty code somehow manages to leak outside of your client and fuck over other programs.
chrome is basically unusable whilst the client is open because it causes it to crash for whatever reason.
The client also prevents you from opening any other programs, and you have to either close the lol client or sign out then back in again.
not to mention the disconnect error at the start of every goddamn game despite being connected to the internet. you actually have to relog to get into a game.

inb4 "hur dur not the league client, its something else" no its the league client because this shit only happens when the league client is open.
fix your spaghetti code.
